pkgmetadata.longdescription: Extension to R Serialization // Extends the functionality of R serialization by augmenting the built-in reference hook system. This enhanced implementation allows optimal, one-pass integrated serialization that combines R serialization with third-party serialization methods. Facilitates the serialization of even complex R objects, which contain non- system reference objects, such as those accessed via external pointers, for use in parallel and distributed computing.
